title: One kitten for Kim
creator_credit: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Joe Hayward and Hector Lemieux
brief_description: Tells the story of a boy with seven kittens who is told by his parents that he may only keep one and must give the rest away. Encourages discussion of Kim’s adventures, the reactions of his parents and the experience of lower grade students of finding homes for pets. Suitable for lower primary level.
